title: miniSB displays all games for selected date
miniSB flips to next day at 10AM
Team logos appear next to tri-code in XL viewports (1303+)
Game-type - Spring Training label is displayed
Game-type - Exhibition label is displayed
Event type - Home Opener label is displayed
Event type - All-Star Game label is displayed
Event type - Free Game of the Day label is displayed
custom_preconds: GIVEN game that is marked as Free Game of the Day
custom_expected: THEN game that is marked as FGOTD should show "Free Game of the Day" text in top right corner of game cell

title: Event type - Facebook Watch label is displayed
custom_preconds: GIVEN game is marked as Facebook game of day
custom_steps: WHEN user views miniSB and game marked as Facebook game of day
custom_expected: THEN "FB-Watch" or "Facebook Game of Day" label should appear in top right corner of game cell

title: miniSB Header - shows current day of week
custom_steps: WHEN user loads MLB.com and views miniSB
custom_expected: THEN miniSB header should read the current day of week

title: miniSB Header - include "All Scores" link
custom_preconds: GIVEN miniSB is up on homepage
custom_steps: WHEN user loads MLB.com and clicks on "All Scores" link
custom_expected: THEN "All Scores" link should link to scores page for current day (mlb.com/scores)

title: Split-squad notation (when available)
API Refresh - Every ~15 seconds
miniSB switches from Vertical to Horizontal view below 1024px
Game cell - Game state is displayed (abstractGameState)
Game data - Game times are displayed in ET
Teams - Away team displayed on top
Teams - Home team displayed on bottom
Teams - Team Matchup links to Gameday
Product Links are displayed - Gameday Preview(Paper image), Ticket link (green ticket)
Game data - All game states are displayed on the scoreboard (PPD, Warmup, Final, Inning, Challenge, etc.)
Teams - Away team displayed on top
Teams - Home team displayed on bottom
Teams - Matchup links to Gameday
Game data - Runs are displayed
Product Links are displayed - Gameday (field image), Radio (headphones), MLB.TV (TV)
Facebook Game of Week Product link and Game text should appear in blue
Call Outs - Live Look In banner appears (Yellow) - NOT FOR 2019 SEASON
custom_preconds: GIVEN user viewport in Large or XL and miniSB contains game with Live Look In
custom_steps:
WHEN 
1. user views Live Look In banner
2. user clicks Live Look In banner
custom_expected:
THEN
1. Live Look In banner appears as Yellow bar
2. Live Look In banner links to VPP page

title: Call Outs - Perfect Game/No Hitter banner appears (Red)
custom_preconds: GIVEN user viewport in Large or XL and miniSB contains game with a No Hitter or Perfect Game on miniSB
custom_steps:
WHEN
1. user views NH/PG banner on miniSB
2. user clicks on NH/PG banner on miniSB
custom_expected:
THEN
1. NH/PG banner appears as Red Bar with text
2. NH/PG banner should link to Gameday

title: Game data - Inning should read TOP 6 /BOT 6 (remove st,nd,rd,th)
custom_preconds: GIVEN in web viewports, load mlb.com during live game
custom_steps: WHEN user loads mlb.com on web browser in L & XL viewports
custom_expected: THEN Inning text during live game should read "TOP 6" or "BOT 6". Should not show (st,nd,rd,th)

title: Game data - Challenge/Review text should appear next to inning text
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a game in a Challenge or Review state
custom_steps: WHEN user views the game cell that has a Challenge or Review state
custom_expected: THEN Challenge or Review text should appear next to inning text

title: Game data - IF FGOTD AND Challenge = true, switch to read "Chal"
custom_preconds: GIVEN game is a FGOTD and in Challenge state

title: Game data - All game states are displayed on the scoreboard
Game data - If extra innings, show final inning
Teams - Away team displayed on top
Teams - Home team displayed on bottom
Teams - Losing team is greyed out
Teams - Team Matchup links to Gameday
Game data - Runs are displayed
Facebook Game of Week text should appear in blue even after game is complete
Product links are displayed and all link to Gameday - Wrap (paper image), Box Score (linescore image), Highlights (video image)
Game Cell - game cell should get a grey shade background when game is FINAL
Preview Link - Displayed for all games not live/final - XL, L, M, S, XS
Preview Link - URL syntax - https://www.mlb.com/gameday/gamePk/preview
Ticket Link (WEB) - Displayed when ticket link is available - XL, L, M, S, XS
Ticket Link (MOBILE) - Displayed when ticket link is available - XL, L
Ticket Link - URL syntax - TBD
MLB.TV Link (WEB) - Displayed when game in Preview, Live, Final state - XL, L, M, S, XS
MLB.TV Link (MOBILE) - Not displayed in any viewport for Live/Archive games
MLB.TV Link when game in Preview State - URL syntax - http://mlb.com/mlb/subscriptions/index.jsp?product=mlbtv
MLB.TV Link when game is in Live or Final state (with media) - URL syntax - https://www.mlb.com/tv/g[gamePk]
Gameday Link - Displayed for connected/non-final games - XL, L, M, S, XS
Gameday Link - URL syntax - http://www.mlb.com/gameday/gamePk
Box Link - Displayed for postgame games - XL, L, M, S, XS
Box Link - URL syntax - https://www.mlb.com/gameday/gamePk/final/box
Wrap Link (WEB) - Displayed when wrap has been published - XL, L, M, S, XS
Wrap Link (MOBILE) - Displayed when wrap has been published - XL, L
Wrap Link - URL syntax - https://www.mlb.com/gameday/gamePk/final/wrap
Audio Link - Displayed when media .on - XL & L
Audio Link - URL syntax - https://www.mlb.com/tv/g[gamePk]?mediatype=audio
Gameday Postgame Video Link - Displayed in XL & L
Gameday Postgame Video Link - URL syntax - https://www.mlb.com/gameday/gamePk/final/video
PPD - Original Game Date is "Final" - PPD: Makeup MM/DD
PPD - Makeup Date is "Preview" - Makeup of MM/DD - PPD
CAN - Original Game Date is "Final" - Cancelled
SUSP - Original Game Date "Suspended" - T/U status - SUSP (T6): Resumed on MM/DD - Keep inning indicator and add note
SUSP - Original Game Date "Completed" - O/T status - SUSP; Completed on MM/DD
SUSP - Resumed Date - "Suspended" - T/U status - Completion of suspended game on MM/DD - Add score, inning indicator and note
SUSP - Resume Date - "Completed" - O/T status - Completion of suspended game on MM/DD
Sort games by Live > Preview > Final > PPD/SUSP/CANCELLED
All double headers should be sorted next to each other in Preview & Final game state (single ticket/split ticket)
Game 1 Live and Game 2 Preview - sort together
Game 1 Final and Game 2 in Preview/Warmup/Live - do not sort together
Spring Training games should be sorted at beginning of miniSB
